BANK HOLIDAY: 1 November 2021 – SEPA payments paused
Due to the upcoming public holiday on Monday, 1 November 2021, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for all SEPA payments will be closed.
Scheduled downtime on 20 October at 8 AM UTC
